package.name: arp-scan
package.shortDescription: ARP scanning and fingerprinting tool. Arp-scan is a command-line tool that uses the ARP protocol to discover and fingerprint IP hosts on the local network. It is available under the GPL licence (GPLv3)

descriptionlist.description:
An interesting utility that suppresses WI-FI on all devices that are connected to the same network as you, but at the same time you can continue to use the Internet to the fullest.
Operating instructions: • Download this utility • Open the utility shortcut that appears on the home screen • Swipe down to search for connected devices • Press the Kill all button and that's it, WI-FI stops working on connected devices.
